datanesia is a collaborative effort to collect, organize, and provide better access to dataset of Indonesia. Open, for all.

started and maintained by ramda, OKFN Indonesia and Asia Knowledge and Innovation Lab

Wanna contribute? here's current laundry list:

  • find as many government dataset as possible and identify their openness, both in technical and legal aspect
  • liberate Indonesian public sector document available in public domain and convert them into open format
  • use these resources (credits/attributions are greatly appreciated!) and spread the words

More projects at work over at github.com/datanesia.

Design adapted from theunitedstates.io.

/government-dataset

List of government data portal's URL for you to download or scrape

/pemilu-data

List of 2014 legislative election candidates, political party, and district boundary map. A joint project of Perludem and The Asia Foundation.

/idn-adm-div-ont

OWL ontology and knowledge base that attempts to reflect the official, current administrative division structure in Indonesia. Developed by Andhika Nugraha.
